title: [Rotorua]
creator_contributor_role: New Zealand National Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New Zealand - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New Zealand - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Maori (New Zealand people) - Social life and customs
description: Incomplete film with no title describing New Zealand. Shows footage of town of Rotorua and varius geysers and mud pools, Maori children at play in thermal pools, Maori women cooking over steaming geysers. Accompanied by explanatory narration. Also includes footage of Waikato River but film abruptly stops in mid-sentence.
